official_title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide for public disclosure of the amounts of Federal funds used to conduct field examinations of appropriation estimates.

summary.text: Amends Federal law with respect to the preparation and submission of appropriations requests to the President. Requires each Federal agency head to publish monthly in the Federal Register a notice of: (1) all amounts made available during the past month for field examinations of appropriations estimates; (2) the purpose and location of each field examination; and (3) the identity of all Members of Congress, congressional staff, and agency officers and employees who participated in the field examination.
